The Vue-Chartjs component is included by default with Leo Vue.

The Vue-Chartjs component isnâ€™t used directly, it is necessary to subclass each graph type.

The following Chartjs components are included by default with Leo Vue:

  • Line Chart
  • Bar Chart
  • Pie Chart
  • Doughnut Chart
  • Polar Chart

The chart components can refer to data in nodes in the Leo document.

In this section, a number of example charts and data sets are displayed.

Some of the examples are adapted from the excellent Chartjs Intro articles by Tobias Ahlin.
